mapper.select: SELECT import_statement_id as importStatementId, import_datetime as importDateTime, link_user_id as linkUserId, link_account_number as linkAccountNumber, pdf_file_checksum as pdfFileChecksum, pdf_file_data as pdfFileData, status FROM import_statement WHERE status='P'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO import_statement (import_datetime, link_user_id, link_account_number, pdf_file_checksum, pdf_file_data, status) VALUES (#{importDateTime}, #{linkUserId}, #{linkAccountNumber}, #{pdfFileChecksum}, #{pdfFileData}, #{status.statusCode})
